CREATE TABLE cli01_hubspot_contatos_teste (
    id_hubspot TEXT,
    nome TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    telefone TEXT,
    empresa TEXT,
    importado_em TEXT
);

The following columns are in the cli01_kpis_definicoes table in the kpisempresas database:

|---:|:----------------|:---------------|:----------------------|:--------------|:------------|
|  6 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_kpis_definicoes | id            | integer     |

CREATE TABLE cli01_kpis_definicoes (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    id_client INTEGER,
    nome_kpi TEXT,
    descricao TEXT,
    formula_sql TEXT
);

The following columns are in the cli01_marketing table in the kpisempresas database:

|    | table_catalog   | table_schema   | table_name      | column_name   | data_type   |
|---:|:----------------|:---------------|:----------------|:--------------|:------------|
| 11 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | id            | integer     |
| 12 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | c_date        | date        |
| 13 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | campaign_name | text        |
| 14 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | category      | text        |
| 15 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | campaign_id   | integer     |
| 16 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | impressions   | integer     |
| 17 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | mark_spent    | numeric     |
| 18 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | clicks        | integer     |
| 19 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | leads         | integer     |
| 20 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | orders        | integer     |
| 21 | kpisempresas    | public         | cli01_marketing | revenue       | numeric     |

CREATE TABLE cli01_marketing (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    c_date DATE,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    category TEXT,
    campaign_id INTEGER,
    impressions INTEGER,
    mark_spent NUMERIC,
    clicks INTEGER,
    leads INTEGER,
    orders INTEGER,
    revenue NUMERIC
);
